resources.string: " I visited a country the last 14 days"
STAY at home as much as possible
"Cannot connect to the server, please check your internet connection "
"You must fill in the indicated fields "
"I don't have permission to use GPS "
"It is quite possible that you have the disease, please go to the indicated address. "
"There is already a user with this email, please try another email "
"There are no cases registered in the app "
"Password must be a minimum of 8 characters "
Email or password not recognized, try again or if you are not registered please register
"Activate the location to perform the test "
There is no user with that email
You must fill in the all fields
If you press Confirm you will receive a message with a new password

"Protect yourself and those around you by informing and taking appropriate precautions. Follow the advice of your local public health agency. To prevent the spread of disease: Wash your hands often. Use soap and water or an alcohol-based hand sanitizer. Keep a safe distance from anyone who coughs or sneezes. Do not touch your eyes, nose, or mouth. When you cough or sneeze, cover your nose and mouth with your elbow flexed or with a tissue. Stay home if you feel bad. If you have a fever, cough, and shortness of breath, seek medical attention. Call ahead. Follow the instructions of your local health agency. Avoiding unnecessary visits to healthcare facilities enables healthcare systems to function more effectively, resulting in your protection and that of others. "
Does not show symptoms of having any disease
If you continue, you will modify the data you have requested to modify if you agree with the data entered, press accept
You are about to delete your user registered in this app, once you press confirm you will not be able to log in again with your credentials. Do you want to continue?
The entered password does not match the one already established
The new password cannot match the old one
